import React,{useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Add() { const [title, setTitle]=useState() const [author, setAuthor]=useState() const [cover, setCover]=useState() async function saveBook(e){ e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:2014/books',[title,author,cover]) console.log(title,author,cover) setTitle('') setAuthor('') setCover('') } catch (error) { toast(error) } } return (
Add New Book
setTitle(e.target.value)} required />
setAuthor(e.target.value)} required />
setCover(e.target.value)} required />
); }
